item.title: MicroK8s
item.description: MicroK8s MicroK8s is a small, fast, single-package Kubernetes for developers, IoT and edge. Pros: Very easy to install, upgrade, remove Completely isolated from other tools in your machine Does not need a VM, all services run locally Cons: Only available for Snap supported Linux Distributions Relatively new, possible unstable Minikube can also run directly on Linux (vmdriver=none), so MicroK8s value proposition is diminished 参考 Local Kubernetes for Linux – MiniKube vs MicroK8s
